mapper.update: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE IF NOT EXISTS zapp_date_t (dt_s varchar(20) NOT NULL, dt_e varchar(20) NULL, wod int null)
mapper.select: select substring('${stasdate}', 1, 4) as wy , WEEK(STR_TO_DATE('${stasdate}', '%Y-%m-%d')) as wy1 , WEEK(STR_TO_DATE('${staedate}', '%Y-%m-%d')) as wy2 from dual;

select 'Q1' as wy , concat('${stayear}', '-01-01') as wy1 , DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(concat('${stayear}', '-04-01'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') as wy2 from dual union all select 'Q2' as wy , concat('${stayear}', '-04-01') as wy1 , DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(concat('${stayear}', '-07-01'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') as wy2 from dual union all select 'Q3' as wy , concat('${stayear}', '-07-01') as wy1 , DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(concat('${stayear}', '-10-01'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') as wy2 from dual union all select 'Q4' as wy , concat'${stayear}', '-10-01') as wy1 , DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(concat(cast((cast('${stayear}' as int) + 1) as char(4)), '-01-01'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') as wy2 from dual

select 'FH' as wy , concat('${stayear}', '-01-01') as wy1 , DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(concat('${stayear}', '-07-01'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') as wy2 from dual union all select 'SF' as wy , concat('${stayear}', '-07-01') as wy1 , DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(concat(cast((cast('${stayear}' as int) + 1) as char(4)), '-01-01'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') as wy2 from dual

mapper.select:
select dt_s as stasdate
, dt_e as staedate
, dt_e as staedate
, dt_e as staedate
, dt_e as staedate
, coalesce((select count(*) from zapp_contentlog where 1 = 1
and loggerid = '${objid}'
and loggerdeptid = '${objid}'
'${act}'
and logtime like concat(dt_s, '%')
and logtime between concat(dt_s, ' 00:00:00') and concat(dt_e, ' 23:59:59')
and logtime between concat(dt_s, ' 00:00:00') and concat(dt_e, ' 23:59:59')
and logtime between concat(dt_s, ' 00:00:00') and concat(dt_e, ' 23:59:59')
and logtime between concat(dt_s, ' 00:00:00') and concat(dt_e, ' 23:59:59')
and logtime like concat(dt_s, '%')
group by loggerid
group by loggerdeptid
), 0) AS stacnt from zapp_date_t

with recursive R_STATUS as ( select statusid , staobjid , staobjtype , stacnt , stadate , staaction , statermtype from zapp_status where staobjid = '${staObjId}' and staobjtype = '${staObjType}' and stadate between '${staSdate}' and '${staEdate}' and staaction = '${staAction}'
union all select get_sha256(concat('${staObjId}', cast(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as varchar(10)), '${staObjType}', '${staAction}') as statusid , '${staObjId}' as staobjid , '${staObjType}' as staobjtype , coalesce((select count(*) from zapp_contentlog where loggerid = '${staObjId}' and action = '${staAction}' and logtime like concat(cast(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as varchar(10)), '%') group by loggerid), 0) as stacnt , STR_TO_DATE(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as stadate , '${staAction}' as staaction , 'D' as statermtype from dual
) select dt_s as stasdate
, dt_e as staedate
, dt_e as staedate
, dt_e as staedate
, dt_e as staedate
, coalesce((select sum(stacnt) from R_STATUS where 1 = 1
and stadate = dt_s
and stadate between dt_s and dt_e
and stadate between dt_s and dt_e
and stadate between dt_s and dt_e
and stadate between dt_s and dt_e
and stadate like (concat(dt_s, '%'))
), 0) AS stacnt from zapp_date_t
